name: ScrewKey
text: What is this? A wrench? The thing is necessary, might be helpful.

name: Vodka
text: Aha, vodka!

name: coins
text: A penny saved is a penny gained.

name: WindowBroken
text: It's broken, I can't close it with bare hands.

name: WindowFixed
text: The window is closed, the wind is not blowing.

name: ToiletDoorNoCrowbar
text: The lock is closed. I need a tool or a master key to open it.

name: ToiletDoorHasCrowbar
text: I'll have to see if I have something that will open that door.

name: sinkNoBathItems
text: I can't wash myself only with water, I have already notably scabbed.

name: sinkHasBathItems
text: Gotta get a toothbrush, soap...

name: aspirin
text: Oh, I might use that in the future!

name: crowBar
text: Wake up, Mr. Simon.

name: potion
text: What a purple drink!

name: bathItems
text: Fresh towel, uh, how good it smells!

name: boyaryshnik
text: This will probably come in handy.

name: glass
text: Right size for tea or something stronger.

name: shuba
text: I hope there will be no aftermath for it.

name: TaskCompleted
text: Task completed!

name: bathedInSink
text: It is much better to be washed!

name: wireInTopSpot
text: Wire is in the top slot.

name: wireInMiddleSpot
text: Wire is in the middle slot.

name: wireInBottomSpot
text: Wire is in the bottom slot.
